title: AiPhlo | Luxury Design Systems & Advanced API

meta.description: Premium navigation templates and AI-powered design automation for Webflow
meta.keywords: webflow template, luxury navigation, design api, migration tools

slots.headline:
Luxury Navigation.
Intelligent Automation.
slots.subtitle: Two powerful products for designers who refuse to compromise. Premium templates for instant elegance. Advanced API for intelligent site migration.

slots.headline: Two Products. One Vision.
slots.content: Whether you need a stunning template you can install today, or an intelligent system that migrates and transforms entire sites—AiPhlo delivers luxury-grade results.

cards.title: Phantom Nav Template
cards.description: Premium Webflow template with cinema-grade navigation, galleries, and interactions. Install in minutes.

cards.title: Advanced Design API
cards.description: AI-powered migration system. Extract, transform, and deploy sites with intelligent automation.

slots.headline: AiPhlo Phantom Nav Template
slots.description: The exact navigation system powering this site—now available for your projects. Includes all gallery types, smooth interactions, and luxury styling that makes template sites look custom-built.

tiers.name: TEMPLATE
tiers.description: Complete template with all navigation systems and galleries. You handle the installation.

tiers.name: PHANTOM INSTALL
tiers.description: Template + full migration service. We extract your existing site, apply the Phantom Nav system, and deliver a polished result.

slots.headline: AiPhlo Advanced Design API
slots.description: The engine behind our migration service—now available as an API. Extract design tokens, migrate content, and transform sites with AI-powered automation. Built for Webflow.

tiers.name: BASIC
tiers.description: Perfect for occasional projects. Token-based usage with essential features.

tiers.name: SEMI-PRO
tiers.description: For design studios and freelancers. Enhanced features with design suggestions.

tiers.name: PREMIUM
tiers.description: Full power for agencies. Unlimited calls, white-label, and dedicated support.

slots.headline: From Source to Stunning
slots.subhead: How the AiPhlo system transforms your site

steps.title: Extract
steps.description: Our extraction engine scans your source site, capturing colors, typography, spacing, and interaction patterns with pixel-perfect accuracy.

steps.title: Transform
steps.description: AI analyzes the extracted data, mapping it to our luxury design system while preserving your brand identity and optimizing for performance.

steps.title: Deploy
steps.description: The transformed site deploys to Webflow with all content, images, and interactions intact. Ready to customize or launch.

items.quote: The Phantom Nav template transformed our portfolio site. Clients think we spent $20K on custom development.
items.author: Sarah Chen

items.quote: Migrated 3 client sites in a week using the API. What used to take a month now takes days.
items.author: Marcus Webb

items.quote: The design token extraction is incredibly accurate. Colors, spacing, everything matches perfectly.
items.author: Elena Voss

items.question: What's the difference between the Template and the API?
items.answer: The Phantom Nav Template is a complete, ready-to-use Webflow template with luxury navigation systems. The Advanced Design API is a developer tool for automating site migrations and extracting design tokens programmatically.

items.question: Can I use the $25 template without the installation service?
items.answer: Absolutely. The $25 template includes complete documentation for self-installation. The $495 tier is for those who want hands-off, white-glove migration where we handle everything.

items.question: What platforms does the API support?
items.answer: Currently optimized for Squarespace-to-Webflow migrations. WordPress and Shopify import capabilities are in development and will be available to all subscribers.

items.question: Is there a free trial for the API?
items.answer: We offer a sandbox environment with 50 free API calls to test the extraction engine. Contact us to get access.

items.question: What's included in the migration service?
items.answer: Full content extraction, image optimization, design token mapping, custom color matching, typography optimization, and 2 rounds of revisions. We deliver a production-ready Webflow site.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: Template purchases include a 30-day money-back guarantee. API subscriptions can be cancelled anytime with no penalty.

slots.headline: Ready to Elevate Your Design?
slots.subhead: Join designers who've discovered the AiPhlo advantage.
